QAPair.Question: What is (are) Electrocardiogram ?
QAPair.Answer: An electrocardiogram (ECG) is a test that records the electrical activity of the heart.

QAPair.Question: Who is at risk for Electrocardiogram? ?
What to do for Electrocardiogram ?
QAPair.Answer: The accuracy of the ECG depends on the condition being tested. A heart problem may not always show up on the ECG. Some heart conditions never produce any specific ECG changes.
